description: Grants the user the ability to produce and control all different types of poison, as well as absolute immunity to poison. The user's entire body becomes made of poison.

users.circumstances: Magellan ate the fruit at some point before becoming Chief Warden of Impel Down

abilityReveals.description: Creates a multi-headed poison hydra from the user's body that pursues and envelops opponents in lethal poison. The poison is so corrosive it melts everything it touches.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Magellan uses Hydra to attack Luffy on Level 4, forcing him to flee across the chasm.

abilityReveals.description: Launches a ball of poisonous gas at opponents from a distance. The gas attack allows the user to attack without direct contact.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Magellan uses Chloro Ball when Luffy crosses a chasm to escape the Hydra.

abilityReveals.description: Allows the user to travel through their own poison at high speed, moving across the battlefield with unprecedented mobility.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Magellan uses Venom Road to close the distance to Luffy by traveling through his poison.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
User can be damaged by direct physical attacks if opponent is willing to accept poisoning
weaknesses.description: Luffy demonstrates that Magellan can be hurt by direct hits, though the attacker will be poisoned in the process.

weaknesses.weakness: Causes severe chronic diarrhea from consuming poisoned food

strengths.description: User cannot be poisoned by any substance.

strengths.strength: Body made of poison makes direct combat nearly impossible
strengths.description: Anyone who touches Magellan's body is instantly poisoned with lethal toxins.

strengths.strength: Can produce various types of poison ranging from mild to lethal
strengths.description: User has complete control over the type and potency of poison created.
The poison spreads like a disease over everything it touches, even melting stone and metal.
